summary: Build a modern, trustworthy, mobile-friendly, SEO-optimized educational website named "Knowledge IQ" for competitive exam preparation (UPSC, SSC, RRB, WBCS, PSC) with a dark navy blue and saffron theme, hero visuals, and key content sections plus CTAs.
architectural_notes: Mobile-first responsive layout and performance-conscious design for exam-prep audience.
On-page SEO best practices: semantic HTML, meta title/description, proper headings, and structured content sections.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero illustration with India map outline and four exam icons (book, target, globe, chart) in a modern flat style, dark navy + saffron accents (knowledge-iq-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
- Set of four standalone flat icons: book, target, globe, chart matching the hero style and palette (knowledge-iq-icons-set.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive, modern landing page for an educational website named "Knowledge IQ" focused on competitive exams (UPSC, SSC, RRB, WBCS, PSC) using a dark navy blue and saffron theme with a clean, trustworthy, exam-oriented look and consistent typography/spacing across all sections.

Implement a hero section that includes: (1) a visual featuring an India map outline and exam-prep icons (book, target, globe, chart), (2) a clear headline/subheadline in English describing exam preparation, and (3) call-to-action buttons labeled exactly "Start Practice" and "Download Free PDFs".

Add distinct, clearly labeled homepage sections for: Daily GK, Mock Tests, Current Affairs, Previous Year Questions, and Free PDFs. Each section should include a short description and an obvious action (button/link) to explore that section.

Implement basic on-page SEO for the website: set an appropriate HTML title and meta description for "Knowledge IQ"; ensure there is a single H1 on the homepage; use semantic landmarks/structure (header, main, section, footer) and accessible alt text for meaningful images.
Ensure the generated hero artwork is included as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and is used in the hero section without fetching images from the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create "Knowledge IQ" educational website focused on competitive exams (UPSC, SSC, RRB, WBCS, PSC) with modern, clean, exam-oriented design
Apply dark navy blue + saffron color theme and overall trustworthy branding
Add hero section featuring India map outline and exam icons (book, target, globe, chart) plus CTAs ("Start Practice", "Download Free PDFs")
Include main sections: Daily GK, Mock Tests, Current Affairs, Previous Year Questions, Free PDFs
Implement SEO optimization (basic on-page SEO/meta structure)
